mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_PAYMENT(treatment_id, payment_status, payment) VALUE(#{id}, 'RR01', '10000')
mapper.select: SELECT r.name, p.* FROM TB_PAYMENT p JOIN TB_TREATMENT t ON p.treatment_id = t.id JOIN TB_RECEPTION r ON r.uuid = t.uuid WHERE p.payment_status = 'RR01' ORDER BY t.treat_date
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_PAYMENT SET payment_status = 'RR02', payment_date = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
